title: Perfect Square
text: This equation is a perfect square
speech: This equation is a perfect square
pacedSpeech: This equation is a perfect square

title: Factors
text: In this equation $${ax}^2+bx+c$$ the square root of a and c are $$10$$ and $$-1$$ respectively.
speech: In this equation  a x squared, plus b x plus, c  the square root of a and c are  10  and  negative 1  respectively.
pacedSpeech: In this equation   a x squared, plus b x plus, c
the square root of a and c are   10

title: Plug in
text: Plug into the perfect square simplified form $${\left(nx+m\right)}^2$$ where $$n$$ is the square root of a and $$m$$ is the square root of c
speech: Plug into the perfect square simplified form  parentheses, n x plus m,  squared  where  n  is the square root of a and  m  is the square root of c
pacedSpeech: Plug into the perfect square simplified form   , n x plus m,  squared
is the square root of a and   m
is the square root of c
